ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Code Red
ComicInfo.Summary:
Disregarding her orders, Red charges in to face the Dark Horde on her own. However, a simple mission quickly turns to a fight for her life when Red finds herself hopelessly outgunned. Can Red survive when the Horde rises anew, or will she fall in their shadow? Find out in this game-changing issue!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jamal Igle & Romulo Fajardo Jr. | 1 | B | Cover B | Steven Cummings & Stephen Schaffer | 2 | C | Cover C | Martin Able | 3 | D | Cover D | Marat Mychaels & Sanju Nivangune | 4 | E | Amazing Arizona ComicCon Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Jamie Tyndall & Ula Mos | 5 | Digital | Digital Edition | Marat Mychaels & Sanju Nivangune | 6 |
